page.title: 05HOUSING IN LAMERTON 2
page.content: There are three new houses in Lamerton.One of the houses is called the Barn.The Barn is a barn converted into a house.It has red tiles on the roof.Ruth Horsley from our school lives there.White Gables is a detached house.It is very new and modern.The roof is gabled and has asbestos slate on the roof.It has 2 storeys and has a small front garden. The older terraced cottages are mostly much smaller than the newer houses, and many of the older people still live in them.Some new houses for old people are to be built at the end of the Council estate,and there are also some new houses being built near the bridge.
